revision.comment: /* People */copyedit, standard date handling in WP, circa handling, general fixes using [[Project:AWB|AWB]]
revision.text:
'''Bob Diamond''' may refer to:
==People== *[[Bob Diamond (banker)]], an American banker *[[Bobby Diamond]], California lawyer who was a child star and young-adult actor of the 1950s and 1960s *[[Bobby Dimond]], Australian rugby league footballer of the 1940s and 1950s
==Fictional characters== *[[Bob Diamond (comics)]], a Marvel Comics character *Bob Diamond, an advocate in the movie [[Defending Your Life]]
{{hndis|Diamond, Bob}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Diamond, Bob}}
